long_description: Distance yourself from your competition with the Wigwam Distance socks, conveniently packaged as 2 pair for great value. Soft, breathable cotton and polyester fibers are blended with stretch nylon for added durability and support; a touch of spandex ensures a snug, comfortable fit. Dri-release(R) treatment helps keep socks dry through quick moisture wicking and fast drying; FreshGuard(R) deters odors. Breathable mesh air vents atop insteps help feet stay cool and comfortable. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Distance yourself from your competition with the Wigwam Distance socks, conveniently packaged as 2 pair for great value.
